name: Product Quantity Dropdown For Woocommerce
author: silverplugins217

sections.description:
Woocommerce Product Quantity Dropdown Plugin modify your single product page, shop page, and category page on convert qty text box to the dropdown.

It Change Add to Cart Quantity into a Select Drop-down in woocommerce shop, category and single product page.

In this plugin, we manage many features for fixed quantity dropdown in woocommerce. If you want to apply for all products otherwise we give option product by category, tag, and specific product for come only wocommerce numeric dropdown.

If you want to change the position of the Quantity box then you can also change it. as well as a drop-down in minimum, maximum quantity, and step features added.

FEATURES PRODUCT QUANTITY DROPDOWN FOR WOOCOMMERCE:

  • Easy to use
  • Enable disable plugin features.
  • Minimum quantity and maximum quantity allowed for quantity dropdown.
  • Step for increase quantity.
  • Quantity drop-down label.
  • WPML Support

ðŸŒŸ Documentation | ðŸŒŸ Demo | ðŸŒŸ Pro | ðŸŒŸ Support

FEATURES PRODUCT QUANTITY DROPDOWN FOR WOOCOMMERCE PREMIUM:

  • Display quantity box via product quantity rule ex:(all products, specific products).
  • For specific products select multiple products, categories and tags for quantity dropdown.
  • Display quantity dropdown via specific single product in product setting.
  • Enable/Disable quantity dropdown in Shop/category Page.

CONTRIBUTE AND TRANSLATE

Product Quantity Dropdown For Woocommerce is translated into multiple languages Chinese, Dutch, Russian, Spanish, and many more. Help localize Product Quantity Dropdown For Woocommerce even further by adding your locale Language. Click Here
sections.faq:
Product Quantity Dropdown For Specific Products

You can select multiple products, categories, and tags for quantity dropdown.

How to convert the Quantity Field to a dropdown in WooCommerce

You just need to install this plugin and enable the option then it will convert for all products.
